name: Scott Johnston
quote: When I heard Mr Frederico say 'you pissed off the wrong daddy' I was all in. It's good to see a pissed off dad letting the criminals (the ones with ties and without) know that you will never forget me or Logan. God bless you and your family. Enough! If I can do anything going forward, I'm in.

name: John Carlo
quote: Honestly, there's no words! Your daughter and family deserve justice and I won't stop until you get it! We will get results with these judges and things WILL change or we'll make them.

name: Gina Gullotta
quote: This could happen to anyone including myself and if we don't all unify as one this insanity will keep happening. I will be a voice for Logan because some degenerate waste of sperm took her voice. Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go. - Joshua 1:9

name: Ryan Nakafuji
quote: Sincere condolences to the Federico family. I support Mr. Federico in fighting for justice on behalf of his daughter, Logan. May God bless the Federico family, and rest in peace, Logan!

name: Kate Higgins
quote: We stand with you. These judges are acting irresponsibly and putting the public in danger by releasing dangerous criminals back onto the streets. There must be accountability. No one, not even a judge, should be above the law. Justice should protect the innocent, not empower the guilty.

name: Lana Norris
quote: God bless Logan and her family. Your death will not be in vain, I will make sure of it too! I will support your father as best I can in his journey for justice.

name: Donald Cameron
quote: Our thoughts are with all the Federico family from over the seas in Tasmania. Truly tragic.

name: Toni McGrath
quote: Mr. Federico, I stand with you! Keep speaking loudly!

name: Shanne Fowler
quote: I am so sorry for your loss. I will continue the fight against a broken system and encourage others to do the same. This should have never happened. God bless the Federico family. Logan will never be forgotten.
